title: Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930s
medium:
Medium: wool, glass beads, rhinestones, faux pearls, sequins
Technique: embroidery on a 2-2 plain weave
description: Mustard yellow fabric with embroidered flower and leaf motif worked in gold beads, large yellow rhinestones, gold sequins, and faux pearls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930s. Medium: wool, glass beads, rhinestones, faux pearls, sequins
Technique: embroidery on a 2-2 plain weave. Gift of David Glickman. 1977-81-39.
